description: Read and write CSV files with a single line of code. Reads from files, streams, strings into lists, dictionaries, lists of objects and data tables. Writes from lists of objects or data tables to files, streams, and strings. Handles embedded commas, double quotes, escaped commas, and columns that span multiple lines.
releaseNotes: Kellerman Software annouces a minor update to the CSV Reports Library.  New features, QuoteEachField property which forces quote characters around all fields.  CSV Reports can now be used with COM applications.  It is now possible to use the CsvColumn class to specify the order and header text of columns.
summary: Read and write CSV files with a single line of code. Reads from files, streams, strings into lists, dictionaries, lists of objects and data tables. Writes from lists of objects or data tables to files, streams, and strings. Handles embedded commas, double quotes, escaped commas, and columns that span multiple lines.
title: CSV Reports
